page.title: 10UPPER NEWBOLD
page.content: {Upper Newbold}is a{continuation}of {Cutthorpe Village}in the{Chesterfield {Borough Boundary.}There is one small{ {General Store}at{Four Lane Ends }which is the{junction}of the {B6050 }and { {B6051 roads.}This year a{new housing {estate}has been built on the site of an old bakery. It is to be called {The {Granary }with{4l houses}in about{3 {acres}of land. Hard core has been laid on {Dunston Road }for a new static { {Caravan }site. There are two {Farms} both now sold for private housing and the land being used temporarily for grazing{cattle.}One house has been demolished to be re-built and the other is being renewed.Opposite these farms on {Newbold Road}lives a well-known comedian from television called{Bernie Clifton.}Buses from { {Chesterfield }pass here to {Cutthorpe, {Barlow and Holmesfield.
